歊字的基本解释

歊
xiāo
（气）升腾：“地底烁朱火，沙旁歊素烟。”
炎热：歊暑。“炎威振皇服，歊景暴神州。”

歊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāo］
［《廣韻》許嬌切，平宵，曉。］
［《廣韻》火酷切，入沃，曉。］
亦作“歒1”。
(1)气蒸发貌。
(2)热气。
(3)炽盛；炽热。
(4)同“囂”。参见“歊塵”。

歊字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【欠字部】　歊； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页571第01
【唐韻】許嬌切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】虛嬌切，?音囂。【說文】歊歊，氣出貌。【班固·寶鼎詩】吐金景兮歊浮雲。【註】歊，氣上出貌。【左思·吳都賦】歊霧漨浡。【註】言水霧之氣如雲蒸，昏暗不明也。　又氣盛貌。【前漢·敘傳】曲陽歊歊，亦朱其堂。　又熱氣也。【前漢·揚雄傳】浡滃雲而散歊烝。　又凌歊，臺名。【廣輿記】凌歊臺，在太平府黃山顚，劉宋建離宮於此。　又【廣韻】火酷切【集韻】呼酷切，?音熇。又【集韻】【正韻】?黑各切，音臛。義?同。　又囂也。【集韻】从喬作?。

歊字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
歊字的起名意思

暂无。

vapor
Basic explanation of words
vapor
xiāo
(Qi) Ascends: "The red fire is shining underground, and the smoke is beside the sand."
Hot: Hot weather. "Yanwei Zhenhuang suits, Jinjing storms Shenzhou."
vapor
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiāo]
["Guangyun" Xu Jiaoqie, Ping Xiao, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" is hot, entertaining, and Xiao. ]
Also known as "歒1".
(1) The appearance of gas vaporization.
(2) Hot air.
(3) Flaming; blazing hot.
(4) Same as "clamor". See "Xian Chen".
vapor
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Own Words] 　歊; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 571 01
[Tang Yun] Xu Jiaoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Xu Jiaoqie, sound arrogant. [Speaking of the text] 歊歊歊歊, angered appearance. [Ban Gu·Bao Ding Poetry] The golden scenery and the floating clouds. [Note] 歊, look on the air. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] 歊 Wu漨漡. [Note] The air in the mist is like steaming clouds, and it is dim and unclear.　Also grandiose. [Previous Han·Xu Biography] Qu Yang Xin Xin, also Zhu Qitang.　It's hot again. 【Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography】Xunxianyun and scattered.　You Ling Xiao, the name of the station. [Guang Yu Ji] Ling Shatai, in Huangshan Fu, Taiping Mansion, where Liu Song built his imperial palace.　[Guangyun] Hot Cool Cut [Ji Yun] Hu cool cut,? Yin Xi. Also 【Ji Yun】【Zheng Yun】? Black each cut, sound 臛. Righteous? Same.　It's arrogant again. [Ji Yun] From Qiao Zuo?
